website_summaries.verdict: One of the few ionic professional curl machines that offers interchangeable attachments for certain styles.
pros: Comes with interchangeable curl chambers for different curl styles
Curl chamber uses a circular heating element, providing heat around the hair
cons: Small curling chambers only allow for a small size of hair strand to curl at a time

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love, love, love it. It is Easy to use and produces a great curl. I didn’t have issues with it tangling in cylinder and I have a lot of hair. However I did make sure to fine tooth comb through hair to get all knots out before doing a new section so that might have helped. All and all it took me 15 mins to do whole head on the first try, which it can only get faster from there. I would recommend this curl secret to anyone who is new to curling hair or could never get the hang of the salon style curiling irons like me.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: This product is absolutely awesome! My curls held for 3 days with no ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely awesome! My curls held for 3 days with no product, on the low heat, tight curl setting. The first picture is on day 1 and the second one on day 3! It was so easy to use and it’s the first time I could curl my hair since I don’t knoe how to use regular curling wands. I hoghly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Francina

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a few tries to get the hang of it but I am super happy with the Infiniti Pro 2! I didn't think it was going to work and that I was falling for the hope of curls like THAT once again! My hair is thin and very fine so I really wasn't expecting to find a solution for my styling needs but that's exactly what happened. It's a fun style, the curls hold, and I just feel fabulous! A little pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Vickrey

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work well for my fine hair which kept getting tangled in the curler. You have to section your hair into such small pieces that it takes forever to curl all your hair. The curl didn’t last either so I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Star D

customer_reviews.title: It is so simple to use!
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is amazing, as I have to do my wifes hair for her, and even I can make her hair look good!
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Bussberg Sr.

customer_reviews.title: It is way easier to use than expected. I ...
customer_reviews.text: It is way easier to use than expected. I was intimidated by it at first, but as long as you read the instructions and watch a view tutorials on YouTube, it's really simple. My hair got "caught" a few times, but the tool automatically stops and it is simple/easy to remove your hair. The tool does not "eat" your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tried it quickly once and was very happy. Once I get the hang of it
customer_reviews.text: Tried it quickly once and was very happy. Once I get the hang of it, I believe it will make curling my hair a quick job. Also love that you can rotate curls for the new beachy wave. Spend more money for the interchangeable curl size barrel. I needed a larger barrel.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Time-consuming
customer_reviews.text: For anyone who looks at this product and says "This will save me so much time curling my hair!" : Its not worth it. This product is nice and the curls it makes are cute and perfectly even and spiraled. However, half of the time my (already straight and freshly brushed) hair gets caught in the machine and rejected or I have to rip it out and suffer damaged ends. Overall, it takes much longer to completely curl my whole head with the curl secret 2.0 than it does to just use a curling wand.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Sully

customer_reviews.title: Great, Fast, Read Directions, No Pain!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Read the directions and anyone can use this! I have never used a curling iron in my life (my sister burned my forehead when she curled my bangs once so let's just say I find hot irons a bit scary) so I didn't know if I would like this. It's great! I curled my hair for the 1st time in less than 15 min and I have a lot of curly think hair. I thought my hair was going to get caught in it, but you just open the camber and your hair comes out. You want to comb and twist your hair a bit and then just try again! No big deal!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing!!! Give you body and it's super easy to use. works fast too.
customer_reviews.author: itsallinurmind

customer_reviews.title: THIS WAS DISGUSTING
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy that before I even had the opportunity to use this product fir the first time, it had already been used. I opened the box, which looked like it had been tampered with, and pull the item out...the cord had long blonde hair on the it and as I inspected further and pulled the chamber out to expose even more long blonde hair inside - behind the chamber (see photos). So not cool. I haven't ever experienced anything like this before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: Here it is after our first use. My 20 year old daughter wanted to try it on my hair. My hair was caught in it for 15 minutes while my 18 and 20 year olds dismantled it to get my hair out. Very painful. Deciding who to complain to first.. this seller or go straight to Conair.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kerney

customer_reviews.title: If you value the hair on your head, do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. As someone who uses a wand frequently on my hair, I wanted this to work to make my morning routine easier. The idea behind it is solid, but I had to use such small sections in order for it to work it was a hassle. Definitely do not try to use a medium sized section, or you will regret it! Even sections that I felt were small would get stuck in the barrel and I would have to rip it out of my hair. After the 3rd time of this happening I had had enough period I returned this to get a refund something I never ever do! Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne S

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have super straight hair and have only used a curling iron a handful of times my whole life because I became discouraged at how hard it was for me to curl my hair. This product was super easy, it only took 30 minutes to curl my whole head the 1st attempt and I have a lot of hair, it'llonly get faster in time. I was shocked at how easy it is to work it. It is slightly heavier than most curling irons but most curling irons aren't automatic but nothing too unbearable. I highly recommend for all ages and expertise.
customer_reviews.author: Mg

customer_reviews.title: best curler
customer_reviews.text: I have one already ( for a few years now) but decided to buy the upgraded version. I know the common complaint is hair getting stuck but if you realized that you can not put in a ton of hair you will be okay. I usually grab a small hand full at a time. I have used it when I have short hair ( thats why Im glad for the new attachments) and used it as my hair has grown long. I like this curler better than the ones on the market where you wrap your hair around the curling iron. I find those cumbersome. Best to be used with totally dry hair. And it lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: I watched it to Torio’s after ordering it and was discouraged by what I see but once I used it myself my results were amazing. It is lightweight And happy at the same but I do suggest Taking good care of it so that the item does not break. As far as longevity I’m not sure I’ve just had the item but I’m sure if you take care of anything that you owned a long Jevity of it could be for lifetime and there is no drawing power to it you should not put the wet hair into this item.
customer_reviews.author: Juju

customer_reviews.title: Will eat and destroy hair!
customer_reviews.text: Pure garbage. Ruined my hair. I read the reviews, watched the videos, followed all protocol. This machine eats hair!
customer_reviews.author: CrystalKeslah

customer_reviews.title: Actually works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: This is easier to use than you would think, and it does a pretty good job. All the additional settings that this one has (curl direction choice, time, etc.) as well as the extra curl size cylinder make it pretty versatile. I am still experimenting, but I find that it is good for 2nd or 3rd day hair that has flopped. I thought I would prefer the larger cylinder, but have pretty much settled on the smaller one for a shorter period of curl time. Maybe if i let the larger one go for more time, but it is fairly time consuming, and I run out of patience.
customer_reviews.author: Janels

customer_reviews.title: Tangles Hair in Unit
customer_reviews.text: I used the Curl Secret 2, twice on my long hair and followed the instructions. The first time, my hair in the back on my head got tangled, but I was able to untangle it pretty easily. The second time (again it the back of my head) my hair got tangled and I could not untangle it. I had to get my granddaughter to help, she had to remove the curl size unit (which was not easy as the unit was hot) and slowly untangle my hair from the unit, which took a long time. I really thought I would have to cut it out. I will not use this again on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair Curler EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been my entire life!!! If you have naturally straight hair this is for you!! My hair will not hold curl for nothing. Even for my hairstylist. I’ve spent a lot of money over the years finding the perfect hair curler and girls this is it!! Do not pass this up! It has a different setting for curling your left side and right, making the curls go the perfect way. I normally use the one inch curling attachment to make my curls a little tighter for when they fall during the day. This has been the best item I have purchased on amazon thus far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gooch

customer_reviews.title: Must have. Five stars I promise. If I could give it 10, l would
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. If you’re like me and it’s hard to use a curling iron in the back of your hair or on one side of your head this is so so easy and perfect. It makes beautiful curls that last all day and it really does work. I was sketchy when I was going to purchase it but I promise you that you will love it. I have shoulder length hair and it’s just amazing. I get compliments all the time and I will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon G.

customer_reviews.title: They are getting worse, not better
customer_reviews.text: I had the original for a long time before it stopped working. I was so excited to see this one had multiple size barrels. Unfortunately the quality of this is nowhere near that if my original one. It doesn't wrap as smoothly. Often doesn't beep as it should. Is super finicky about size of hair sections. Often curls just come out looking wonky. I did not have that problem before.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Jent

customer_reviews.title: Wow! It really works.
customer_reviews.text: I never take the time to write a review, but this deserves one. I also never once used a curling iron on my hair, so I thought I would have trouble. I throughly read and followed the directions. I have shoulder length hair that is layered. Most strands are 4-6 inch in length . Had no tangles! the machine stopped if I didnt hold the hair taunt or machine was a bit tilted. I adjusted and the strand went right in. I was worried when I saw the steam but opened to a very smooth shiny curl. Being 57 , my hair is dryer and dull these days so This is so exciting! I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Magnelli

customer_reviews.title: This might be a better device for someone wanting to spend an hour on ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried this thing more than three times. It kept eating my hair. Watched several YouTube videos thinking I just wasn't getting it. I finally gave up. This might be a better device for someone wanting to spend an hour on his/her hair, but that isn't me. Back it went...very expensive curling iron with too much effort required to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never Worked For Me
customer_reviews.text: It could just be my hair, but I never got a good curl when using this. Should have returned it while I had the chance, but kept thinking “maybe next time it will work.” Spoiler alert: it didn’t I have fine shoulder length hair. The curls turned out wonky and tangly and at one point I thought my hair was going to get caught in it like some other reviewers. Thankfully that didn’t happen, but I’m super disappointed by this product
customer_reviews.author: Sad Panda

customer_reviews.title: This works amazing, just know what you are doing before using!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I watched some tutorials before ordering and made sure to read all the directions before using. I have never had an easier time curling my hair. And the curls! I never get these kind of curls. Even after going down the freeway with all the windows down, the curls have held! I’m blown away and am sold on this product! It just arrived today and I am so thrilled that I faved timey sisters so they could see my success.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and easy
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing even on long thick hair. My hair will not hold curls now matter what method I tried. I was afraid to order it at first thinking my hair would get caught in the device so I just ordered the twisted barrel straightener and it just pulled my hair and wouldn't curl with my hair at all. I returned that one and ordered this and I love this one.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Smith

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE.. YOU MAY LOSE YOUR HAIR!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this item in pieces. On the very first piece of hair, it sucked my daughters hair up into the motor and twisted it tight right up to her scalp. It took over an hour and breaking apart the outer casings to get her hair out without having to cut it off. I do expect a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: kynlee

customer_reviews.title: SUCKS UP YOUR HAIR
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about getting this product. I had heard some stories of where it had tangled up hair or it had gotten stuck in the barrel, unfortunately I had this happen to me. when trying it on one side of my head I done to curls and it done fine then went to the other side of my head and it's up to my hair up to the point I had to pull my hair to get it out because it was stuck.I unfortunately do not recommend this product to anyone due to the fact that it sucks your hair up. Amazon gave me a full refund because of this issues thank goodness.
customer_reviews.author: Mekayla willard

customer_reviews.title: Stuck hair!! I don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst curling iron I’ve ever used. It got my hair totally tangled in it. I tried it twice and it happened both times. My son had to help me get my singed hair out of it! In theory this could work well but, it is too hard to use. Might work ok if someone else did it for you. I would suggest you only try it if someone is around to help you get your hair out of the product without cutting your hair off.
customer_reviews.author: G L

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on this. Your hair gets stuck, it pulls the hair so you will def loose some in the process. And it takes an eternity to have a whole head done. My husband purchased this for me (poor guy never gets it right) he was so upset with this purchase. And so am I!
customer_reviews.author: Merr8

customer_reviews.title: Easy for longer hair
customer_reviews.text: I loved this , its Easy to use after you get the hang of it. I watched a few videos on YouTube before begging! It’s easier on long hair but can still be used on Short hair the curls can last up 2 days. Also I usually use my curlers at the highest hottest heat but not with this one I used the lowest heating set and still came out great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: It’s terrible. Leaves uneven curls all over and my hair got stuck in the chamber twice and had to rip it out.
customer_reviews.author: GloryToGod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly.. had a bit of trial and error but i got it down after a bit
customer_reviews.author: MaryS

customer_reviews.title: Great curls. Placement is everything. Practice before giving up.
customer_reviews.text: I like this curler. It does take a moment to figure out how to hold it. I have baby fine hair. Yes my hair did get tangled and I had to rip my hair out but it was because I was learning how to use it. You have to get your hair in the correct spot before closing the curler or you're risking your hair getting tangled in the device.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Finally a tool for me
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, straight, thick hair and have always been curling iron challenged. I just can't manage styling tools. I was skeptical of this but I am pleasantly surprised! I still have a lot to learn but this is fairly easy once you get the hang of it and it does make curls! I do recommend looking online for how to videos for tips. Fun!
customer_reviews.author: M Schia

customer_reviews.title: Not a Sonic Cleaning brush; I bought an automatic hair curler and gave it away.
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this hair curler at all. I followed instructions to a "T" and it snagged my hair. I gave it away to someone with thicker hair, who might not have this problem. I don't think this item is appropriate for anyone with fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: shoop

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware on product
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible for fine hair. It pulled my hair in snarled it in the roller, burned it while trying to get it out! I had to cut a chunk of my hair out. Used per directions, buyer beware on this one.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was the worst! I almost had to cut my teenage daughter’s hair out of it because it got stuck. She was in tears. The hair that didn’t get stuck was barely curled at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing curls BUT the worst Hair Experience
customer_reviews.text: After I bought, I thought this product is good, Amazing and Extraordinary!! Finally, I found an amazing machine for curls... and my curls held for 4 or 5 days. So I was so happy with my Infiniti Pro Secret 2.0 BUT my hair has gotten stuck one time and it was awful to release my hair from the machine and the second time that happened again I was Not able to get it loose and the machine pulled hundreds of strands of hair... That hurt a lot and I Do Not recommend this product to No One. If you do not want to be bald in the worse way. I threw away in thousands of pieces....
customer_reviews.author: Devin Pehrson

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this item. If you do not curl your hair easily this is for you! Only thing is make sure you do not use too much hair, it can get stuck. It is not hard to get your hair out. When you use it a few times it gets easier! It makes curling my hair so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This curling iron works great for me! I hate curling my hair because it takes forever and never stays looking nice. This curler does a great job. I’ve used it twice, and my hair never tangles or gets stuck. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the curls do fall out a bit over the course of the day.
customer_reviews.author: H. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: My friend has another brand no longer available on Amazon and hers made smoother curls but this one is much better about not snagging your hair. My hair only got caught one time. Much easier than traditional curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter as a gift. She reported that it was not all that easy to use and really did not curl well. I have never tried it. She says she is going to give it another try, if I have anything more to report I will.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used one over my friend's house last weekend- a different brand but very similar. I was so impressed that I had to have one. The reviews on this brand looked good so I ordered last night and with prime it was at my door at 7 AM. Of course I had to break it open and try immediately to see if it worked as well as hers. I could not be happier with my purchase. The picture took me 10 minutes to do, As I shake out a little it has loosened up a little more and looks incredible.....like I just left the salon. My only regret is I wish I knew about this sooner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Finkel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. The curls do not hold nor are consistent. Many times hair would get stuck around and I have straight thin hair. You get better results with using 1 inch flat iron and twisting. Now it just holds space underneath my bathroom counter
customer_reviews.author: 1stTimeMama0519

customer_reviews.title: Left my hair smelling like the iron
customer_reviews.text: It didn't meet my needs. Took too long to pull the curl in and heat. Left my hair smelling like the iron. Just not for me. It may work better for someone with different hair needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hair gets suck!
customer_reviews.text: Curls beautifully, BUT your hair gets stuck with small amounts of hair and you dont want that! Lol! So be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Jones

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: The product certainly does what it is advertised to do - make hair curly - but it was not nearly as easy to use as we expected. Hair gets tangled in the device fairly easily. It did seem that the first few times we tried, we attempted to curl too much hair at one time. We will keep trying but the regular curling iron gets a lot more usage in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy and beautiful results
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The curls lasted 3 days after the first use, no products(hair spray, gel, etc.). So quick and easy to use. I can curl all my hair in less than 15 minutes. Very time saving and my hair looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mi55y

customer_reviews.title: Not easy, time consuming
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. I have fine hair, but a lot of it. It’s bulky, heavy and hard to navigate around the head. My hair kept getting tangled and it pulled it out. I watched numerous videos and I still had trouble, not easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting curls!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure about longevity. The last one I had (different brand) lasted about 4 years. I have long, thick, naturally curly, but frizzy, hair, so I only wash once weekly. I use my infinitipro after my hair dries, and the curls will basically last the whole week! The curls do tame/loosen some throughout the week, but still styleable without needing to curl again.
customer_reviews.author: PyperLu

customer_reviews.title: Long hair and it works!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying I have hair down to my waist. So I was super skeptical about buying this. Figured my hair would not curl or it would get stuck and I’d end up with a mess. Both did not happen!! My hair kept curl all day and didn’t get stuck!! It was super easy to use and the results were so pretty! Recommend buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical buying this item, as I do not ever curl my hair because it is so much of a hassle. I can now do my hair in about 10 minutes. I also have pretty fine hair so curl typically falls out pretty fast. I can curl my hair in the afternoon and it will still have some curl the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: Potter

customer_reviews.title: True to description
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as the picture and commercials show, but it does not curl your hair as well as it shows on TV. If you are not careful, your hair can/will get twisted up in this. Still learning how to use
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Ok I normally do not write reviews and I have a thick head of hair! I can never curl my own hair due to always feeling like my arms will fall off or the curl just not staying! I plugged this is and after watching the videos to make sure I was doing it right and I LOVE THIS PRODUCT! It has a sensor if you put too much hair in it, I did panic slightly a few times because my hair was legit stuck but if you pull a few strands out at a time vs trying to yank the whole lump of hair all at once! The curls are perfect and it was so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Well, I used my friends and it was fantastic. Ordered one. Excitement ensued. The barrel kept winding my hair to the point I had to unplug it and have my boyfriend unwind my hair. I now have a burn on my scalp from said incident. Had I been alone, I’d still be wearing this thing as an accessory
customer_reviews.author: K. Teribury

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love with curler!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product I could use on my fine hair and it hold all day. It’s easy to use, makes cute spiral curls and I get compliments on my hair every time I use it. My hair is cut in a bob hairstyle and this works perfect. I love this curler.
customer_reviews.author: PJWood

customer_reviews.title: Long hair?  Don't bother - Short hair Yes
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair - the friend who recommended this to me has short hair. Big difference. I've actually considered cutting my hair out of this thing several times when it gets caught - and yes I did section and yes I did follow directions - just not for long haired girls who have a lot of hair - probably great for people with chin length hair.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn L.

customer_reviews.title: Burned hair smell
customer_reviews.text: I used the dryer 3 times and my biggest complaint was the burning hair smell that occurred after using. Even on the lowest settings my hair smelled burnt. Also, my hair is long and thick and the process to curl took a long time. On a positive note, the curls would last a really long time for me (on a higher heat setting though) - not all day - but at least half the day. I just can’t get past the burned hair smell.
customer_reviews.author: JSpen

customer_reviews.title: Came used with hair in it
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these with my friend over the weekend and had my mind blown her curls looked great! So I got home and ordered one from Amazon. Normally I dont have issues with Amazon orders but this one came all kinds of used. There was hair in it still, the glove had things all over it, and it smelled of burnt-ness. I'm beyond disappointed. I guess when I saw it discounted to $50 and thought it was too good to be true, it really was.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wynen

customer_reviews.title: Curls made easy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this device. So easy to use and safe too. My husband surprised me with this on Christmas as I had recently burned myself which took forever to heal. Curling irons have come a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Catches and does not release hair
customer_reviews.text: Pulls hair a lot more than the original purple one I had. Do like the different sizes for curls upgrade. Does not reverse and traps hair badly sometimes too.
customer_reviews.author: Gundisalvus

customer_reviews.title: VERY HARD TO USE.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and tried it on a couple sections of my hair. It was hard to use and my hair got tangled the 3rd try.
customer_reviews.author: AMBER

customer_reviews.title: Once you learn it it's so fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: If you're a working lady and want a quick way to curl your hair in the morning this is it once you get the hang of how much hair to put into it you'll be on your way out the door quick Love it beautiful curls
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Barnhill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome curls
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! I have really straight hair that does not like to hold a curl but this thing makes perfect bounce curls that last 2 days!!!! Its not anymore time consuming than using a curling iron but they are uniform and perfect every time. I could never get the curls right with a regular curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: J Renaud

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves this.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter in law got one showed to my wife and she really liked it. I got her this as a surprise now she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Holds the most beautiful curls for the longest time!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this machine! Super easy to use very capable of curling thin or think hair. My hair never held any curls from any other curler but things one holds for three days and still looks beautiful! I am in love with product and would not waste my money on any other curling iron! You most definitely get your bang for your buck! This is the only curling iron that has worked for me! Love love love it!! Thank you Amazon prime and conair for it!!
customer_reviews.author: Craig macquarrie

customer_reviews.title: Curly
customer_reviews.text: This curler can make some pretty curls that last. You just have to pay attention that you have the curler pointed the right direction. You can get some curls really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Tore my hair out...constantly jammed and burned myself trying to get my hair out!
customer_reviews.author: pe

customer_reviews.title: Tears up your hair
customer_reviews.text: It says it automatically releases your hair if it gets too much in there. That is a lie. I almost ripped out a huge chunk of my hair that it wouldn’t release, and now I can’t return it
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: Did everything according to instructions. Even watched some videos to make sure I was using properly. My hair got stuck in it more than not. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Hair gets caught
customer_reviews.text: My hair breaks off from use. It also gets caught inside the device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great curls!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this curling iron! My 12 year old uses it all the time! Word of wisdom! Make sure it is used the correct direction other than that easy peasy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t get it to work. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Followed all directions, spent an hour trying to get decent results. Never happened. Returned promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Java Dude

customer_reviews.title: Burns hair easily
customer_reviews.text: Hair gets caught in rollers to easily. Beautiful curls, but not worth burned hair.
customer_reviews.author: Henny

customer_reviews.title: Read the Instructions & Watched a YouTube video on it before using it.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the Instructions, watched a short YouTube video on it & it Worked like Magic! Best part is that it's cut a good 45 minutes off of styling my hair, which by the way is thick & frizzy & I'm Very Pleasantly surprised. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Hair gets tangled if it is not perfectly straight when you place in the chamber But it works well
customer_reviews.author: elisse

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it for the curls she gets when ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it for the curls she gets when she gets them ..but most of the time it gets tangled to her hair I wanted to return it but she likes it so I guess she stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA

customer_reviews.title: Clunky
customer_reviews.text: It is heavy and hard to use. I had high hopes, but just got my hair permed instead.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Tingle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!!! I opened the box and tested it on my 12 year old daughter right away. I was blown away with how easy it was to curl her thick, straight hair. Then I called my neighbor so I could do her daughters... curls are so pretty!
customer_reviews.author: NC Katie Lou

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my for Christmas with skepticism, much to both of our surprise, it works. There is a learning curve of how much hair to use, and it does take time to do the whole head, but its worth it and the curls last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Opened the box and it was used
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I gave this product to my daughter and when we opened the box, I realized it had been used. The plastic wrappers were on the bottom, the glove and accessory was missing. I guess it is not the product itself, but the seller
customer_reviews.author: P523

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and easy
customer_reviews.text: Literally amazing! So much better than the first one. So many different modes to do your hair in and it’s really easy to use. It even has a left and right to curl your hair according to how you want it to face.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Leflar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and super cute curls
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter's wedding this weekend. Tried a couple quick curls today to test it out. Easy to use and super cute curls!!! Can't wait to do my whole head! Hair to mid back.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy P

customer_reviews.title: Hair got tangled
customer_reviews.text: I hated it! Too to long ! Was hard to use
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use .
customer_reviews.text: I Love, love, love it. It is Easy to use and produces a great curl. I didn’t have issues with it tangling in cylinder and I have a lot of hair
customer_reviews.author: Hayder

customer_reviews.title: Creates curls that last for days!
customer_reviews.text: This curling iron makes excellent spiral curls that last for days. Absolutely love it. I get compliments on my hair wherever I go.
customer_reviews.author: C.T.

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I never write reviews but this product is definitely worth the time! Completely idiot proof! I've never been able to operate a curling iron to save my life, this product makes getting salon curls effortless! Five stars!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawson

customer_reviews.title: So easy to curl my hair now
customer_reviews.text: I found it very simple to use. I tried the settings that are suggested in pamphlet, but my curls didn't turn out as they said. I think it just takes some adjustments to get what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda A Buscher

customer_reviews.title: Great tool - only worked 6 times before it broke
customer_reviews.text: I was initially very pleased with this tool - it was easy enough to figure out, and gave my medium/thick hair a great curl. HOWEVER, I only used it maybe 6 times and now it doesn’t take my hair/curl. It heats up, beeps that it’s ready, and does nothing. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B LaBerge

customer_reviews.title: Just what she wanted
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this thing. She has wanted it for a while now. She said it’s easy to use and makes great curls fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.White

customer_reviews.title: That it doesn't  work
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work the way it showed on tv we want a refund
customer_reviews.author: Randy o.

customer_reviews.title: ouch
customer_reviews.text: It isn't as easy to use as the demo suggests on the internet and you tube videos. I'm not sure if I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Sprenger

customer_reviews.title: Easy, perfect curls
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use and the curls last for days (I have thin, fine hair and live in a humid area)! I love the 2 different sizes of curling barrels
customer_reviews.author: C Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Hair gets stuck constantly. Doesn't make curls like shown on the pictures so this is false advertising. Really low quality for the the price you pay. Wouldn't recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased! It works exactly as described. Curls stay for a while with or without product.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Tingle

customer_reviews.title: The curls last forever!
customer_reviews.text: I've never curled my hair before, I took a chance buying this because I had a gift card. This thing is too cool 😄. So easy to use. The curls you see in the picture were done 7 hours ago! They're still intact! Its not the best job, as it was my first time using this but it will just get better. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: MissySue

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Was unsure if this would actually work. It was sooo easy! I curled all my hair in ten minutes and after having it up all night and sleeping on it I just needed a little touch up in the morning. Also my hair won’t hold curls unless I use my flat iron so I was really impressed that my curls held with this!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice waves
customer_reviews.text: Just tried for first time. Easy to use. One time my hair got stuck, other than that, not bad for like 10-15 minutes. So glad I ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Ferguson

product_meta.title: INFINITIPRO BY CONAIR Curl Secret 2; Black
product_meta.description: Hair goes in, curls come out--the Conair Infiniti PRO Secret Curl 2.0 is a revolutionary way to create beautiful, shiny curls. The 1 1/4 in. and 1 in. tourmaline ceramic interchangeable curl chambers allow you to customize your curl. And there are endless combinations to achieve a variety of professional curls from defined curls to beach waves. Perfect for all hair types and contains a safety sensor for tangle-free curls.
feature_bullets: Hair goes in; Curl comes out (with safety sensor for tangle free curls) 1 inch and 1 1/4 inch interchangeable chambers create versatility of styles
Titanium ceramic curl chamber gently heats hair from all directions while creating silk, frizz free style
Ion generator reduces static electricity, frizz, and flyaways for smooth shiny results
2 heat levels, 6 timer settings, 3 curl directions for loose, medium, and tight curls with auto beep indicator for fool proof styling
High performance heater for instant, even heat up and recovery; 450 degree Fahrenheit highest heat for long lasting curls and waves
